knimeNode.name: Keras Subtract Layer
knimeNode.shortDescription: A layer that subtracts two inputs.

fullDescription.intro: A layer that subtracts two inputs element-wise. Corresponds to the Subtract Keras layer . The inputs must be of the same shape.
fullDescription.option: The name prefix of the layer. The prefix is complemented by an index suffix to obtain a unique layer name. If this option is unchecked, the name prefix is derived from the layer type.

ports.inPort: The Keras deep learning network that is the first input of this Subtract layer.
The Keras deep learning network that is the second input of this Subtract layer.
ports.outPort: The two input Keras deep learning networks merged into one by the added Subtract layer.
